title: Two Sum
algorithmDescription: Find two numbers that sum to target using hash table for O(n) solution
detailedDescription: Given array of integers and target sum, find indices of two numbers that add up to target. Input: First line has n and target. Second line has n integers. Output: Two indices (0-based) of numbers that sum to target. Use hash table for O(n) solution. Assume exactly one solution exists.
hints: Use hash table to store seen numbers and their indices
For each number x, check if (target - x) exists in hash table
If found, return current index and stored index
solutionApproach: Create hash table. Iterate through array: for each number, calculate complement (target - number). If complement in hash table, return indices. Otherwise, store current number and index in hash table.
testCaseCriteria: Must find correct indices in O(n) time. Should handle various array sizes and targets. Must use hash table.
